name: ActivitiesOfDailyLivingOrInstrumentalActivitiesOfDailyLiving
title: Activities of Daily Living or Instrumental Activities of Daily Living
description: Assessment of the peron's performance on ADLs and IADLs. (Business ID: Entry 1573536)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Activities of Daily Living or Instrumental Activities of Daily Living.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an assessment of the peron's performance on adls and iadls..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Activities of Daily Living or Instrumental Activities of Daily Living.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Activities of Daily Living or Instrumental Activities of Daily Living.)
